title: Comparative Study of Computer-Based Learning (CBL) Methodologies and Platform Design for Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and computer literacy
context.additional_context: Learners focus on comparing CBL methodologies and developing software platforms in medical education, using personal devices (BYOD) for project execution

learning_goals: Learners can compare and analyze the strengths and weaknesses of various CBL methodologies (e.g., gamification, simulation, VR).
Learners can derive functional requirements when designing software platforms suitable for medical education.
Learners can write case study reports on CBL applications through project-based assessment.

resources: CBL Research Materials for Medical Education

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
